content.question: Which of the following best describes the trends in atmospheric <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration and Antarctic temperature over the past <math alttext="800,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>800</mn><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>000</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> years?

choices.label: Atmospheric <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration has remained about the same, and Antarctic temperature has varied widely over the past <math alttext="800,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>800</mn><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>000</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> years.

Both atmospheric <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration and Antarctic temperature have remained about the same over the past <math alttext="800,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>800</mn><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>000</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> years.

Atmospheric <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration and Antarctic temperature are directly correlated over the past <math alttext="800,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>800</mn><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>000</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> years.

Atmospheric <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration and Antarctic temperature are inversely correlated over the past <math alttext="800,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>800</mn><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>000</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> years.

content.answer: Atmospheric <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration and Antarctic temperature are directly correlated over the past <math alttext="800,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>800</mn><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>000</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> years.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe patterns or trends in data.
